div.p: To [Harpokr]ation alias [Hierax, royal scribe of the Arsinoite nome, Herakleides division], [from A]pion, son of Harpo[kration], the son of [NN, mother S]ara[pous from the metropolis], registered in the quarter of [the areas of Dio]n[ysios]. There belongs [to me] in the Thracian quarter the sixth part of a house and light well and courtyard, in which I register [the below mentioned lodgers] for the house-by-house registration of the past year of Aurelius Commodus Anton[inus Caesar, the lord], in the quarter of the areas of Dionysios, in which I registered (them) in the registration [of the year 14 as well]. And they are Deios, son of Heron the younger, the son of Kapit[on alias NN, whose mother is] Besous, freedwoman of Hermione, daughter of Didas, scrutinized katoikos, 31 years old and (I register) Soterichos, son of Deios, the son of Triadelphos, mother [NN – – –], metropolitan, 72 years old and his son [NN, mother Me]lanous, subject to poll-tax, farmer, 43 years old and Protas, son of Z[– – –, the son of NN] alias Matrone[– – –, mother – – –]phris, subject to poll-tax, farmer, [x years old and – – –]er, son (or daughter) of Ptolemaios, the son of [NN], mother Segathis, registered in the registration [of the 14th year] in the Thara[pia] quarter, [now] in the [(quarter) of the areas] of Dionysios 20 years old and Harpokra[tion, son of – – –]ermas, the son of Sotas of the Other Goosefarms (quarter) [– – – of Th]aisarion
